review: I chose the Chromecast because I wanted better quality for my Netflix streaming movie viewing.  The picture quality improvement was quite dramatic as compared to my old method of streaming using my Wii console.  I like the fact that the Chromecast is controlled by either a web browser, iPhone or iPad.  The downside is that quite often the controlling device will lose communication with the Chromecast, meaning that I lose the ability to rewind, pause or stop a movie.  This happens at least 50% of the time.  I can usually figure out a roundabout way to regain control, but that's a clumsy way to do things.  Hopefully these problems will iron out over time as the software gets improved.
